name: sliced in sauce
title: Gourmet Perle · sliced in sauce · beef, chicken, rabbit, salmon
description: Gourmet sliced in sauce beef, chicken, rabbit, salmon

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: animal meats and by-products (17%, including chicken 6%), extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by-products, mineral substances, sugars. Composition: animal meats and by-products (15%, including beef 4%), extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by-products, mineral substances, sugars. Composition: animal meat and by-products (14%, including rabbit 4%), extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by-products, mineral substances, sugars. Composition: animal meats and by-products, extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by fish (4%salmon), mineral substances, sugars.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/KG: LIVE A: 700; Vit D3: 105; MG/KG: Iron sulfate (II) Monohydrate: (Fe: 8.0); Anhydrous calcium iodate: (I: 0.20); Copper sulfate (II) Pentahydrate: (Cu: 0.7); Monohydrated manganeous sulfate: (Mn: 1.5); Sulfate of Zinc Monohydrate: (Zn: 14.5); Taurine: 440. Aromas.

usageInformation.usage: Your cat is a true gourmet, but sometimes it is difficult to find exactly her taste? For this reason GOURMET has created Perle - Exquisite Stripes. The delicate varieties will appeal to your cat's senses in an irresistible way every day. Selected strips of fish or meat were cooked in a tasty sauce to pamper the palate of small velvet paws. GOURMET Pearl Selected strips - every day a tasteful temptation for a unique taste experience.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Feed your adult cat (4kg) up to 4 sachets per day, which should be divided between at least 2 meals.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: Always leave clean and fresh water available to your cat. For an adult cat of about 4 kg, give 3 to 4 sachets per day, preferably distributed in at least 2-3 meals. The recommended daily rations are calculated for an adult cat to moderate activity in normal environment and temperature conditions. Nutritional needs can vary depending on the cat, so it is necessary to adjust these rations in order to maintain it to its shape. Serve at room temperature.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.
